abstract: University of Milan has dedicated laboratory to help forensic pathologists identify remains of migrants who drowned while trying to make it to Europe by boat; identification of remains is made more difficult by number of factors, including migrants' tendency to leave behind identity cards and difficulty of finding surviving families.
lead_paragraph: Since 2014, a laboratory at the University of Milan has been working to give names to those hundreds of unidentified migrants who have drowned at sea.

headline.main: Italian Lab Battles ‘Not to Lose the Dead’ From Migrant Ships
headline.print_headline: An Italian Lab Battles ‘Not to Lose the Dead’ Who Perished in Migrant Ships

snippet: Since 2014, a laboratory at the University of Milan has been working to give names to those hundreds of unidentified migrants who have drowned at sea.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
